name: formula-parser
description: Google spreadsheet formula parser for writing custom formulas.

scripts.ts-compile: tsc --target ES5 formula-parser.ts formula-grammar.ts argument-grammar.ts dynamic-range-grammar.ts
scripts.build: npm run build-grammars && npm run ts-compile
scripts.package: npm run build && rm -rf out/* &&  npm run uglify -- formula-grammar.js && npm run uglify -- argument-grammar.js && npm run uglify -- formula-parser.js

author: Raphael Couto Ferreira
